name: ORS Biometrics Data Extract Report
description:
This report has the sole purpose of being utilised to populate data within the cssgplc Biometrics system. Report layout and format is specifically designed for this purpose.
ACC0028 - v00.01.00 Last Modified: 27/01/16

dataset.name: Biometrics Data Extract
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, DT_CURRENT_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL AS IEP_LEVEL, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE AS BIRTH_DATE, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, (SELECT offender_book_id, iep_date, iep_time, agy_loc_id, iep_level FROM (SELECT offender_book_id, iep_date, iep_time, agy_loc_id, iep_level, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY offender_book_id ORDER BY iep_time DESC, iep_level_seq DESC) AS row_seq_filter FROM oms_owner.offender_iep_levels) WHERE row_seq_filter = 1) DT_CURRENT_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (DT_CURRENT_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('CQE98K')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER('CQE98K')) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('BAI') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('CQE98K'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, DESCRIPTION, IEP_LEVEL, BIRTH_DATE, FIRST_NAME FROM dataset_base_)
